scripts.docker:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.co:login: aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository naesb --domain naesb
scripts.build-agent: docker build -t naesb-vault-agent -f ./docker/vault-agent/Dockerfile ./docker/vault-agent --platform=linux/amd64 && docker tag naesb-vault-agent:latest 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/vault-agent:latest && docker push 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/vault-agent:latest
